items.title: Model Calibration and Fine Tuning
items.description: ACT-AI builds specialized AI models for your business, tailoring model strategy and hybrid structures for each business case.

items.title: Knowledge Graph Development
items.description: ACT-AI creates industry/area specific knowledge graphs that classify and map key concepts and their relationships, enabling traceable, bound and more accurate AI model outputs.

items.title: Data Labelling and Annotation
items.description: ACT-AI produces high-quality model training data that are sector and language specific through native speaker expert validation and strict labelling quality control.

founders.sectionTitle: Meet the founders driving innovation and impact with applied AI.

marco.name: Marco Spinelli
marco.title: Co-Founder & CEO
marco.bio: Marco Spinelli is a seasoned executive with over 25 years of global leadership experience across top-tier firms including McKinsey, Morgan Stanley, UBS, and Bridgewater. He specializes in product development, AI/LLM applications, data strategy, and digital transformation...

mauricio.name: Maurício Lima
mauricio.title: Co-Founder
mauricio.bio: Maurício Lima is the co-founder and CEO of Henkan Investimentos Ltda. He previously founded and led Invest Tech Participações, Brazil’s largest B2B tech investment firm...
